鐵.definition: iron (metal); arms; weapons; hard; strong; violent; unshakeable; determined; close; tight (slang)

鐵力.definition: Tieli city in Yichun 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang

鐵力市.definition: Tieli city in Yichun 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang

鐵哥們兒.definition: erhua variant of 鐵哥們|铁哥们[tie3 ge1 men5]

鐵嘴沙鴴.definition: (bird species of China) greater sand plover (Anarhynchus leschenaultii)

鐵將軍把門.definition: lit. General Iron is guarding the door (idiom); fig. the door is padlocked — nobody inside

鐵山.definition: Tieshan district of Huangshi city 黃石市|黄石市[Huang2 shi2 shi4], Hubei

鐵山區.definition: Tieshan district of Huangshi city 黃石市|黄石市[Huang2 shi2 shi4], Hubei

鐵山港區.definition: Tieshangang district of Beihai city 北海市[Bei3 hai3 shi4], Guangxi

鐵峰.definition: Tiefeng district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

鐵峰區.definition: Tiefeng district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

鐵嶺.definition: see 鐵嶺市|铁岭市[Tie3ling3 Shi4]; see 鐵嶺縣|铁岭县[Tie3ling3 Xian4]

鐵嶺市.definition: Tieling, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

鐵嶺縣.definition: Tieling county in Tieling 鐵嶺|铁岭[Tie3 ling3], Liaoning

鐵帽子王.definition: iron-cap prince in the Qing dynasty whose title can be passed on to subsequent generations without alteration

鐵幕.definition: Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (In Taiwan, the word was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain.)

鐵律.definition: an iron law; a cast-iron rule

鐵打.definition: made of iron; strong as iron

鐵打的衙門，流水的官.pinyin: tie3 da3 de5 ya2 men5 , liu2 shui3 de5 guan1
鐵打的衙門，流水的官.definition: lit. the yamen is strong as iron, the officials flow like water (idiom); fig. government officials come and go

鐵托.definition: Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980

鐵拐李.definition: see 李鐵拐|李铁拐[Li3 Tie3 guai3]

鐵木真.definition: Temujin, birth name of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2]

鐵東.definition: Tiedong district of Siping city 四平市, Jilin

鐵東區.definition: Tiedong district of Siping city 四平市, Jilin; Tiedong district of Anshan city 鞍山市[An1 shan1 shi4], Liaoning

鐵杵成針.definition: see 磨杵成針|磨杵成针[mo2 chu3 cheng2 zhen1]

鐵板.definition: iron panel; hot iron plate for fast grilling (Japanese: teppan)

鐵板牛柳.definition: fillet beef served sizzling on a hot iron plate

鐵板牛肉.definition: beef grilled on a hot iron plate

鐵板茄子.definition: eggplant served sizzling on a hot iron plate

鐵樹開花.definition: lit. the iron tree blooms (idiom); a highly improbable or extremely rare occurrence

鐵爪鵐.definition: (bird species of China) Lapland longspur (Calcarius lapponicus)

鐵石心腸.definition: to have a heart of stone; hard-hearted; unfeeling

鐵票.definition: (Tw) a guaranteed vote; a vote from sb who consistently votes for a particular party or candidate in elections

鐵票區.definition: (Tw) safe seat (in an election); stronghold (for a political party or candidate); a district in which a majority of voters consistently votes for a particular party or candidate

鐵窗.definition: window with an iron grating (apartment etc); barred window of a prison cell

鐵窗生活.definition: time served in prison; prison life

鐵箱.definition: metal trunk; metal box; a safe

鐵粉.definition: (slang) hardcore fan (abbr. for 鐵桿粉絲|铁杆粉丝[tie3 gan3 fen3 si1])

鐵絲.definition: iron wire; CL:根[gen1]; subway enthusiast (abbr. for 地鐵粉絲|地铁粉丝[di4 tie3 fen3 si1]); railway enthusiast (abbr. for 鐵路粉絲|铁路粉丝[tie3 lu4 fen3 si1])

鐵菱.definition: (military) caltrop (spiky metal device laid on the ground to create a hazard for enemy horses or troops in ancient times)

鐵蘭屬.definition: (loanword) genus Tillandsia; air plants (more commonly known as 空氣鳳梨|空气凤梨[kong1qi4 feng4li2])

鐵蛋.definition: iron egg, a Taiwanese snack made by stewing eggs in soy sauce and air-drying them each day for a week

鐵血.definition: iron and blood; (fig.) weapons and war; bloody conflict; (of a person) iron-willed and ready to die

鐵血宰相.definition: Iron Chancellor, refers to Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, minister-president of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890

鐵西.definition: Tiexi district of Siping city 四平市, Jilin; Tiexi district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning

鐵西區.definition: Tiexi district of Siping city 四平市, Jilin; Tiexi district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning

鐵觀音.definition: Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)

鐵道部.definition: Ministry of Railways (MOR), disbanded in 2013 with its regulatory functions taken over by the Ministry of Transport 交通運輸部|交通运输部[Jiao1 tong1 Yun4 shu1 bu4]

鐵達尼號.definition: RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912 (Tw); PRC equivalent: 泰坦尼克號|泰坦尼克号[Tai4 tan3 ni2 ke4 Hao4]

鐵鈎兒.definition: erhua variant of 鐵鈎|铁钩[tie3 gou1]

鐵鎂質.definition: mafic rock (containing magnesium and iron, so comparatively heavy, making oceanic plates)

鐵面.definition: iron mask (as defensive armor); fig. upright and selfless person

鐵馬.definition: armored horse; cavalry; metal chimes hanging from eaves; steel barricade; (Tw) bike

鐵齒.definition: (Tw) obstinate; argumentative; opinionated; skeptical of superstitions (from Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [thih-khí])
